Comment: A lot of business runs on loans. If businesses can pay a slightly lower interest rate on those loans, they can eke out a few more dollars in profit. A lot of business people get hung up believing that these few dollars will revolutionize their business, but I've seen the "take the time to do it right the first time so you don't have to do it twice" philosophy work a lot better.
